remarks: Lemma for founded recursion.  The domain of the union of a subset of ` B ` is a subset of ` A ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 29-Apr-2012.)
statement:
frrlem5.1 $e |- R Fr A $.
frrlem5.2 $e |- R Se A $.
frrlem5.3 $e |- B = { f | E. x ( f Fn x /\ ( x C_ A /\ A. y e. x Pred ( R , A , y ) C_ x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( y G ( f |` Pred ( R , A , y ) ) ) ) ) } $.
frrlem5d $p |- ( C C_ B -> dom U. C C_ A ) $.
